text:
The [[Demesne|Demesnes]] of Shadow in [[Metrol]] was one of the largest and most important [[enclave]]s of House
[[Phiarlan]] in [[Khorvaire]]. Aside from being the
seat of the house [[matriarch|Elvinor Elorrenthi d'Phiarlan]], it was the finest
institution for studying what [[Phiarlan]] calls
the “arts of deception.” This encompasses the
artistic applications of [[illusion]] magic, as well
as the broader elements of playing a role and
deceiving an audience—vital skills for both
actors and orators. 

After the [[Mourning]], a new [[Demesne of Shadow]] was established in [[Sharn]].
title: Demesne of Shadow (Metrol)
